events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position at our company and will begin the review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for the Software Engineer role, based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter familiar with technical engineering positions has been assigned to oversee your application process and will contact you shortly.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background and experience as a software engineer and next steps in the recruitment process.
Thank you for your timely response. We appreciate your enthusiasm for the Software Engineer position and your flexibility in scheduling the interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10:00 AM UTC. This session will focus on your coding skills, system design, and problem-solving abilities.
